main event: A civilian observed a white rectangular light near Waterloo, Illinois, which faded from view after approximately 3 minutes.
interesting points: The light was visible for about 3 minutes before it gradually faded out., The observer had previously seen a similar phenomenon., The observer was a 62-year-old retired Army teacher., No noise was heard during the sighting., The weather at the time was cloudy with a wind speed of 8 knots.
witness description: 62-year-old male, retired Army, now a teacher clerk
